.class public auto ansi sealed SubscribeContextCallback`1<(class System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem) TContextItemType> extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub SubscribeContextCallback(Of TContextItemType)(item As TContextItemType)
generic <typename TContextItemType> where TContextItemType : ContextItempublic delegate void SubscribeContextCallback(TContextItemType item);
type SubscribeContextCallback<'ContextItemType (requires 'ContextItemType :> ContextItem)> = delegate of 'ContextItemType -> unit

Docs.typeparam: The type of the context item.
Docs.summary: Defines a callback method that will be invoked when a context item changes.
